name: Eldoran
storyline: It was an era in which the world was shaken by an unprecedented collision. As our Earth and a parallel universe Earth reached exactly the same position in the universe, shocking anomalies emerged on both worlds. The anomalies selectively fused the Earths together, not only annihilating entire regions but also significantly decimating life on both sides. The few survivors found themselves in a world permeated by mysterious energies and vibrant crystal beings. Eldoran, as the locals of the parallel world named it, became a magical place that evoked both fascination and terror.
summary: Explore an open world in Eldoran, build settlements, rescue survivors, discover new technologies, and battle numerous foes. Your adventure awaits in this unique reality born from the merging of two worlds!
